document.full_text: u.s. representative connie mack announced on friday that he will not challenge senator bill nelson for the florida seat once held by mack's father, a surprise decision from the republican.
document.title: florida congressman says he will not run for senate
lines_and_colors: u.s. representative connie mack announced on friday that he will not challenge senator bill nelson for the florida seat once held by mack's father, a surprise decision from the republican.
